alert.mustLoginOrRegister: You must first login or register to access this resource. You will be redirected automatically after logging in.
alert.clickToDismiss: Click on this ribbon or log in to remove the warning.

nav.needHelp: Need immediate help? Contact us at 555-555-5555 or info@forensik.ca

home.bestOffice: Take advantage of the leading computer forensics company to identify the source of malicious or criminal activities and put an end to them quickly

services.error: An error has occured while modifying the services.
services.selectServices: Select your desired services in order to generate a security questionnaire.
services.processDescription: The security questionnaire helps us to target your needs and speeds up the onboarding process dramatically. No purchase is required throughout the process.

modal.title: Creation of a service request
modal.description: This action will redirect you to the security questionnaire and will create a request on our side for the following services:
modal.emptyCart: You must select one or more services to create a request. Please close this window and make a services selection according to your needs.

username.length: Your email must contain between 3 and 50 characters

password.strategy: Password must be between 8 and 50 characters long, one number, at least one uppercase letter, at least one lowercase letter, at least one number and at least one special character

firstName.length: First name must be under 50 characters long

lastName.length: Last name must be under 50 characters long

phoneNumber.invalid: Invalid phone number, the accepted format is: 555-555-5555

organization.length: Organization must be under 50 characters long

title.length: Title must be under 50 characters long
